review.title: “Nice Place to Work if You Like a Family Environment”
review.pros: Pros – Nice work environment, management makes it a point to hire pleasant, dependable employees. Team work and "pitching in" are valued
review.cons: Cons – Benefits package is terribly inadequate and retirement policies are heavily weighted to benefit upper management. Employee turnover is very high.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Do not be afraid to invest more in employee benefits, this will pay off in the long run in terms of staff productivity and loyalty.
